Text: One of my all-time favorite books, I feel identified with the main character, pity you use weird formats rather than the normal pdf.

hey sarsapil!  jsut be thankful the file is here for you to take.  The calibre takes all of 2 minutes to install and converting takes less time than writing this to you.

Dr. pepper!  thanks!
I, for one, appreciate the .mobi format so I can put it right on my kindle without converting it.  Thank you, drpepperman39, it's much appreciated.
I hope you are no stranger to receiving a 'thank you' for uploading this.

I for one appreciate the .mobi format, far better than pdf format for so many reasons. 

Thanks for taking the time to upload the book.
Thank you so much for posting the books. I do appreciate it.
